mapper.select: SELECT P.UPLOADERSEQ, U.NICKNAME, P.TITLE, P.PRICE, P.DATE1, P.DATE2, P.INFO, P.IMAGE1, P.HASH, P.INSERTDATE, P.XAXIS, P.YAXIS, P.VIEW FROM PRODUCT P, USERDATA U WHERE P.UPLOADERSEQ = U.USERSEQ AND P.PRDSEQ = #{param1}
SELECT C.CMTSEQ, C.USERSEQ, U.NICKNAME, C.COMMENT, C.INSERTDATE FROM USERDATA U, COMMENT C WHERE C.USERSEQ = U.USERSEQ AND C.READFT = 1 AND PRDSEQ = #{param1}
